block.name: HyDRA-AAS Network
block.make: hydra.hydra_gr_server_network($host_addr) if $(tx_center_frequency) > 0 and $(tx_samp_rate) > 0 and $(tx_fft_size) > 0: self.$(id).set_tx_config($tx_center_frequency, $tx_samp_rate, $tx_fft_size, $host_addr, $remote_ip) if $(rx_center_frequency) > 0 and $(rx_samp_rate) > 0 and $(rx_fft_size) > 0: self.$(id).set_rx_config($rx_center_frequency, $rx_samp_rate, $rx_fft_size, $host_addr, $remote_ip) self.$(id)_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.$(id).start_server) self.$(id)_thread.daemon = True self.$(id)_thread.start()
